title: Effects of Multifunctional Cerium-Doped Carbon Dots on Photosynthetic Capacity and Nutritional Quality of Lettuce
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00374H, Paper
Shili Zhao, Chen Li, Caijuan Wu, Juan Hu, Zhiwei Zhang, Wei Li, Chaofan Hu, YingLiang Liu, Bingfu Lei, Mingtao Zheng
As biocompatible water-soluble nanomaterials, carbon dots (CDs) have attracted the interest of researchers in agricultural production. In this work, cerium-doped carbon dots (Ce-CDs) have been prepared as a water-soluble carbon...
